title: Citizen Harold
creator_credit: Hugh Foulds, Robert Verrall and ONF | NFB
brief_description: An animated satire about one man’s attempt to bring changes in his community through participation with fellow citizens and the local government. A discussion starter with a dual ending, for groups exploring methods of bringing about change. (Awards: New York, Melbourne, Columbus.)
